title: Charles Dunbar & Katriel Paige
content:
JAFAX welcomes back Charles Dunbar with their wealth of knowledge about Japan and its mythology, along with their love for all things Japan!

This time, we've also invited their partner, Katriel Paige to share with our community their interest in how fandom and modern communications have allowed the exchange of ideas, culturally and Shinto and other religious culture from East to West and vice versa.

Take a look at their bio here
